dcterms:description: The first Chinese-English parallel corpus annotated with user behavior, consisting of 57,639 Chinese sentences collected from a real-world online MT system, with 17,099 sentences annotated with their English translations by linguistic experts according to user-specific historical inputs.
dcterms:title: UDT-Corpus

dcterms:description: A dataset composed of the News Commentary v12, UN Parallel Corpus v1.0, and CWMT corpora, totaling 25M parallel sentences used for pre-training the NMT model.
dcterms:title: WMT2017 Chinese-to-English dataset
